info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haywood County through 100 PM EDT... At 1233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Waynesville, or 4 miles south of Clyde, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Canton around 1250 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sunburst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
